update activity
activity_name = #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_type = #{activityType,jdbcType=BIT},
activity_status = #{activityStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
publishing_organization = #{publishingOrganization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_brief = #{activityBrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_pic_pc = #{activityPicPc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_pic_app = #{activityPicApp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
active_store_range = #{activeStoreRange,jdbcType=BIT},
activity_scope = #{activityScope,jdbcType=BIT},
update_time = now() where activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT a.activity_id,a.activity_name,a.activity_type,a.activity_status,a.begin_time,a.finish_time,a.publishing_organization,a.activity_brief ,a.activity_pic_pc,a.activity_pic_app,a.create_by,a.update_by,a.create_time,a.update_time,activity_scope FROM activity a JOIN activity_store s ON a.activity_id = s.activity_id where 1=1 AND s.store_id in (#{storeId}, 'all' ) AND a.begin_time < now() and a.finish_time > NOW() and a.activity_status=0 AND s.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY a.activity_id order by a.begin_time desc

SELECT a.activity_id, a.activity_name, a.activity_type, a.activity_status, a.begin_time, a.finish_time, a.publishing_organization, a.activity_brief, a.activity_pic_pc, a.activity_pic_app, a.create_by, a.update_by, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.active_store_range, a.activity_scope FROM activity a left JOIN activity_store s ON a.activity_id = s.activity_id LEFT JOIN activity_product p ON a.activity_id = p.activity_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND s.store_id in (#{storeId}, 'all' )
and p.sku_code = #{productId} and a.activity_scope=1
and p.product_brand_code = #{productBrandCode} and a.activity_scope=3
and p.product_category_code in
#{item}
and a.activity_scope=2
and a.activity_id = #{activityId}
AND a.begin_time < now() and a.finish_time > NOW() and a.activity_status=0 AND p.is_delete = 0 AND s.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY a.activity_id order by a.begin_time desc

SELECT a.activity_id, a.activity_name, a.activity_type, a.activity_status, a.begin_time, a.finish_time, a.publishing_organization, a.activity_brief, a.activity_pic_pc, a.activity_pic_app, a.create_by, a.update_by, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.active_store_range, a.activity_scope FROM activity a left JOIN activity_store s ON a.activity_id = s.activity_id LEFT JOIN activity_product p ON a.activity_id = p.activity_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND s.store_id in (#{storeId}, 'all' )
and p.sku_code != #{productId} and a.activity_scope=4
and a.activity_id = #{activityId}
AND a.begin_time < now() and a.finish_time > NOW() and a.activity_status=0 AND p.is_delete = 0 AND s.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY a.activity_id order by a.begin_time desc
